author: Reuters Editorial
title: CORRECTED-BRIEF-Hangzhou Century Says It Plans To Issue Up To 500 Mln Yuan Bonds (April 9)
text:
(Corrects figure to 500 million yuan from 5 billion yuan in bullet point and headline)
April 9 (Reuters) - Hangzhou Century Co Ltd:
* SAYS IT PLANS TO ISSUE UP TO 500 MILLION YUAN (NOT 5 BILLION YUAN) BONDS Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2JykfRy Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.3095 Chinese yuan renminbi) ($1 = 6.2969 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
